article: jacques rogge , president of the international olympic committee -lrb- ioc -rrb- , defended china 's sports system which led to its medal haul at the beijing games , saying all systems are legitimate as long as they respect ethical values and the athletes .
abstract: ioc chief says no problem with china 's sports system
